inn1.comm: the first ball outside off on length keeps very low, Rohit defends it towards cover
on the off stump this time, it doesn't bounce too much either, and Rohit defends it back
swings away from Rohit from back of length outside off, he leaves it alone
slightly short of length outside off and shaping away, Rohit guides it to third man to open his account
right on target - on the middle stump on length and Dhawan defends it back
shorter and wider outside off, Dhawan cuts it straight to point
angled in slightly from outside off, Rohit defends it on the leg side
length ball coming in towards middle and leg, tucked straight to midwicket
stump-to-stump line from Mathews as this one is on off and Rohit defends on leg again
that was close! Rohit came down for a big drive but managed an inside edge onto his back leg and it wasn't too far from the leg stump
keeps very low again. It was outside off on length and hardly rose but Rohit defended it
good bounce this time outside off, Rohit cuts and misses. And Mathews starts with a maiden
on middle and leg, pushed down to mid-on, Dhawan takes a couple of steps down but says no just in time to send Rohit back
another inside edge! It swung in from outside off, Dhawan drove firmly but the swing produced an inside edge to square leg for a single
shaping away from off stump on length, Rohit opens the face of the bat to help it to point
straight delivery and short of length on the off stump, Rohit stays back and steers it to midwicket
onto the pads this time and slightly slower, tucked to fine leg for one
139kph, well outside off, Dhawan reaches out to drive without any footwork and can't middle it, it goes back to the bowler
full and outside off, guides to point with an open face
short of length outside off, Rohit defends with soft hands on the off side and they sneak in a quick single
slightly back of length on middle and off, Dhawan pushes it to short cover

Dhawan gets room and cashes in on it. It was angled away from him on short of length and Dhawan only had to time it well, without footwork, between point and cover point for the first boundary of the match
width on offer again but Dhawan can't middle it this time, cuts to cover point
length ball on off, driven off the backfoot to cover
on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket and a fumble gives the openers a single
bit of bounce outside off from length, Dhawan helps it past point for one
nips in towards middle and leg, Rohit defends it to midwicket for a single
on the off stump, Dhawan punches it off the backfoot past cover for another four. It bounced around knee length this time
and one more - gets more room this time around similar length and he stands tall to drive it square off the backfoot past point for another four
rolls his fingers over the ball this time and it's on length outside off, driven down to mid-off by Dhawan
length ball on middle stump, driven towards long-on for a single
inside-edge on an offstump delivery, looking for the turn perhaps, edge sends the ball towards square leg
full and on the pads, clipped to square leh for a single
flighted, full ball is defended to the leg side
just drops it short, not much turn for Senanayake here, Rohit rocks back and carves it behind point for four
length ball on middle and leg, defended back down the track
well outside off from Mathews, 126kph, Dhawan wants to cut that but it stays low and sneaks under his bat
skips down the track, taps a shortish ball to the off side
short of length ball, on middle and off, Mathews not trying anything fancy here, blocked back
guides this one towards point, can't find the gap
pitched up this time, 126kph, a thick inside-edge onto the padas Dhawan looks to drive off the front foot
pushed towards extra cover for a quick single
full ball is whipped towards midwicket
defends off the front foot towards point
on off stump, pitches it up again, blocked to the off side
and again, watchful stuff from Dhawan
punched towards short cover, no run
worked away towards midwicket for a single
slanting into the pads, whipped away towards midwicket
short of length ball outside off, Rohit looks to cut that one, off the bottom edge and past the keeper's left leg
short of length ball on the pads, defended towards midwicket
just outside off, steers this towards short third man, wants a single but there's no time for it
Rohit defends this one off the front foot towards point
short of length and well outside off, guided down to third man for a single
full and on the pads, squeezed towards square leg, dot ball

huge appeal, and given, Rohit is way down the track, had taken a couple of steps out of the crease, pitching around off and middle, Rohit is hit on the pad as he can't get the bat down in time, that looked to be heading for the middle stump, Rohit is aghast at the decision, perhaps because he thinks being down the track is enough to put doubt in the umpire's mind when it comes to an lbw, Nigel Llong doesn't have any doubts, he sends Rohit on his way
Kohli gets back in the crease and defends his first ball
bottome egde as he looks to chop thatt through the off side
on the pads, Kohli puts it away down towards fine leg for four, effortlessly done by Kohli
short of length ball on leg stump, tapped towards deep square leg for a single
a touch fuller, solid defence from Kohli
turns the ball from outside off towards midwicket for a quick single
defended towards short cover
length ball outside off, guided towards point by Dhawan
on the pads, Dhawan whips it towards deep midwicket for a single to end the over
length ball is defended onto his pads
full ball on off, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single, there's a fumble at mid-on making it easy for the batsmen
drops it short, gets away with it, Kohli mistimes a shot towards square leg
gets back in the crease and punches this towards long-on for a single
pokes this in front of point, a tap-and-run single for Dhawan, India will need more of these on a track where the ball isn't coming onto the bat
well outside off, Kohli wants to power it through cover, but bottom-edges it, into the ground before reaching the keeper
one more quick run, Dhawan pushes towards mid-off
a thick inside edge as Kohli wanted to defend this back of length ball, the ball rolls towards square leg
Dhawan skips down the track and guides the ball towards sweeper cover for one more
a touch short, well outside off, steered down to third man
short of length ball is driven towards sweeper cover for one more, India batting sensibly here, not trying any big strokes, happy tow work the singles
once again the ball keeps low, Kohli adjusts in time to block it
length ball is driven towards short extra cover
on the pads this time, whipped towards deep square leg
Kohli jumps out of the crease and cracks this one through cover for four, he made sure he got close to the pitch of the ball before playing that
guided behind point for a single
and another boundary, bottom hand comes off as Dhawan goes for the cut,still he has placed it behind point, and it has enough power to reach the rope
worked towards square leg for a single
driven on the up towards point by Dhawan
on the pads, guided down to fine leg for a single
angling in towards leg stump, flicks it away towards deep square leg for a single
Dhawan skates down the track and drives back at the bowler
Dhawan loves the cut, even when there's not enough room to play it powerfully, he chops this one towards point but can't get it pas the fielder
this time he gets width, throws his hands at it and sends the ball towards sweeper cover for a single
full on off, Dhawan leans forward and turns it to leg
pitch up on off, driven down to long-off for one
still full outside off, driven straight to short cover
on length but on the leg stump, steered to deep midwicket
touch fuller on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
poor delivery - well outside leg and Kohli paddles it fine past the keeper for an easy four
full toss on leg, swept only for a single to deep square leg

big appeal for stumping - Sangakkara is very very confident. Kohli leaned forward to push the delivery to off but was beaten by the turn and he came well outside the crease. Sanga didn't take too much time to take the bails off but it looks like Kohli made it back just in time with his right toe inside the crease. Not Out says the third umpire. Time for drinks now
on length outside off, pushed to long-off off the backfoot for one
full on middle, driven straight to midwicket
on length on middle, Dhawan waits for the ball and tucks it on the leg side for one
full and well outside off, driven firmly to deep cover
well outside off and driven to deep cover for an easy single
slightly shorter outside off, cut to deep point off the backfoot
really short and keeps low, Kohli went back to pull but could not because of the bounce and it went only to midwicket
strays down leg for a wide now
short of length outside off, Kohli sends it down to long-on for one
outside leg, Dhawan is pretty strong there and he sweeps it past deep backward square leg for four
full and outside off, Dhawan drives and Chandimal dives at cover to save a few runs
flighted outside off, driven straight to cover
closer to the batsman and pushes it back to the bowler
close to the off stump, Kohli pushes it to cover
short of length, Kohli looks to cut it late but doesn't connect properly
length delivery outside off, Kohli opens the face of the bat to point but there's no time for a single
touch fuller outside off and he drives it to deep cover for one. Only a single of the over
slightly full on off, pushed past cover for one and that's the 50 partnership
short of length on middle and leg, Dhawan defends it to midwicket
slightly slower on off, Dhawan leans forward and pushes to cover
touch fuller outside off, driven in the gap past cover for one this time
short of length and turning away, it keeps low, and Kohli gets a bottom edge towards point
Dhawan comes down and tucks it to midwicket
flighted full toss outside off, Kohli only sends it to cover
another poor delivery - short on going down leg and it keeps low so Kohli can't connect
another full toss well outside off, Kohli drives it to deep cover
full on leg, tucked off the pads to deep square leg for one
on length and angled in towards off, Kohli takes some risk and cuts it late to short third man
on length around off, Dhawan defends towards cover with soft hands for a quick single
outside off on length, pushed for a single towards cover
short of length on the stumps, pushed down the ground to long-on for one
quicker and outside off, Dhawan looks to cut and misses
goes down the leg side, it hardly bounces, for a wide
length ball on the pads, tucked to midwicket
loud appeal for lbw as Dhawan came down to drive it straight but the ball pitched around leg and was going down further
outside off, Kohli uses the room to drive it to deep cover
he comes down and drives it authoritatively through the covers for a single
Dhawan comes down too and drives to long-on for one more
front foot again for Kohli who drives this one past cover for one more
slightly slower on the pad, Dhawan helps it to short fine leg and brings up his fifty
slightly full outside off, pushed towards cover for one
short ball, Dhawan goes back and pulls it firmly to deep midwicket for one and it's India's 100
short ball outside off, Dhawan punches it with a cut off the backfoot and the fielder in the deep does well to dive to his right and stop the second run
short of length outside off, steered to deep cover for one
short, but quick at 135kph, on middle and Dhawan gets his bat on it just in time
short outside off, Dhawan cuts with a lot of power but the fielder at point does well to save a few runs
outside off again, driven to deep cover for one this time
angled towards middle and leg, Kohli tucks it effortlessly off his pads past short fine leg for a four. Beautiful timing from Kohli
comes down the track and defends it back
touch fuller on middle stump, Dhawan leans forward and defends
sways down leg and sweeps it to deep fine leg for one
angled in towards the stumps, Kohli comes down and pushes it back
the short ball finally gets punished! Another poor delivery from de Silva and Kohli was quick to go back and pull it over the deep-midwicket fence for six
takes a step down and pushes to long-on to keep strike
short of length outside off, helped to third man for one
sways down leg and Dhawan whips it past short fine leg off the pads for a four which races to the boundary
off cutter from middle stump, Dhawan makes a bit of room and drives past cover
short of length outside off, keeps low and Kohli defends it to cover
short of length outside off, cut late by Kohli to third man
Dhawan pulls this time and it goes all the way! It was short on middle and Dhawan went back to launch it over the wide long-on boundary for six
eased towards sweeper cover for a single
Dhawan steps down the track and tucks the ball towards fine leg for a single

Mendis has done it! the big one, his carrom ball has taken out Kohli's off stump, pitching on middle and slight movement away beats Kohli, I suppose these days getting Kohli for less than a half-century can be counted as a success, Kohli mimes how the ball moved as he walks off
solidly defended by Rahane off the front foot
spinning in from outside off, chopped towards sweeper cover for a couple
gets back in the crease as he defends this towards cover
Dhawan gets forward aand drops the ball towards cover, no run
again played towards cover, Rahane was motoring for the single, Dhawan wasn't as keen, Rahane has to hare back
big lbw appeal but that looked to be sliding down the leg side
driven towards deep extra cover for a single
defended off the front foot towards mid-on
length ball is blocked off the front foot, just one off the over, immediate impact of he Kohli wicket
thick inside edge as Dhawan looks to drive towards long-off, instead the ball goes towards long-on
gets forward and defends towards point, 'Come on,' Rahane shouts as they take a quick run
swept fine by Dhawan, a diving stop at deep backward square leg by Senanayake, who is one of the better fielders in the Sri Lanka side
again down the leg side, again Dhawan sweeps, once more Senanayake has work to do, a sliding stop
pitched up, well outside off, driven towards point for a single
punched from the crease towards sweeper cover for a single
short of length ball, 129kph, pushed towards mid-off
driven off the back foot towards mid-off
played with soft hands towards cover, a quick single is pinched
bit of width, cracked through covers for one more
lovely looking drive from Rahane, can't beat mid-off, and he has to scamper to make his ground in time, there's a direct hit from Mathews, but Rahane is safely home
short of length and another tight single, again Dhawan plays with soft hands to get the run
on the pads, worked towards square leg for one more
length ball is driven towards cover, no run this time
pitched up and that is eased towards long-on for one more
driven towards long-on for another single, good stuff this from Dhawan
drops it short and that is chopped towards sweeper cover
on the pads, worked towards deep midwicket for one more, the 150 comes up
not much footwork from Dhawan as he slaps this towards cover, can't beat the fielder
low full toss, powered by Dhawan to extra cover, again finds the fielder
another low full toss, less fierce shot from Dhawan, gets the single though, to long-off
full toss on off stump, tapped towards midwicket for a single
skips down the track and pushes the ball towards mid-on for one more

full  ball on the pads, seemed to be heading for a boundary after Rahane clipped that towards deep square leg, but Senanayake is there on the rope once again, another smart stop from him to save a couple of runs
swept towards fine leg for a single, that was a full ball from Chaturanga de Silva
defended solidly off the front foot
driven towards sweeper cover for a couple, risk-free batting from these two
pushed back towards the bowler once more
on the pads, clipped to midwicket for a single
just a touch short from Chaturanga, that's enough for Rahane to rock back and slam over to square-leg boundary for four
short of length ball, Dhawan races down the track before tucking the ball towards mid-on for a single
full and on  the pads, nudged behind square leg
sliced towards point, Dhawan sets off for the run, even though there's a direct hit, Dhawan has reached fairly comfortably
worked to the leg side for a single
spinning in towards off, cut towards point, but can't connect
Dhawan wants to thump that over the leg side, but it is a quicker one well outside off, bounces more than Dhawan expects and he can't get bat on it

Malinga begins with a pinpoint yorker, squeezed out towards point, there's a direct hit but Rahane's dive means he's home well in time, good work from Senanayake though, who's having a great day in the field
full and outside off, Dhawan drives that towards deep point for a single
another yorke from Malinga, dug out towards cover by Rahane, just a single, there boundaries haven't arrived yet in the :Powerplay

low full toss on the pads, Dhawan doesn't quite middle it as he looks to send it away on the leg side, even though it was a top-edge and the ball turned in his hands, he gets it away for four to midwicket
full and outside off, poked towards cover for a single
another full ball, jammed behind point for a single
Rahane is gone, he charged out of the crease, looking to loft this over extra cover -a favourite region of his - get a thick outside edge instead and that loops to backward point for a simple catch
plays a wristy drive to midwicket first up
on off stump, whipped towards deep midwicket
defended toward cover for a quick single, a strategy Dhawan has used often this innings
on off and middle, worked towards midwicket, batsman seemed to have played it quite comfortably, but Senanayake thinks that could have sneaked past the bat
attempted yorker is a low full toss on middle and Rayudu flicks it with his wrists to the deep midwicket boundary for four
full and outside off, pushed to cover by the batsman
tries a yorker again and Rayudu drives it on the on side, doesn't get the middle this time, and gets two more
loud appeal even though Rayudu got an inside edge onto his pad after the ball came in from length from around the off stump
swinging in again from length, Rayudu leans forward a bit and defends it on leg
low full toss on middle and leg, steered to deep midwicket for two more to end the over
pitched up outside off, Dhawan guides it to shot third man
turning in from off, turned to the leg side with the wrists for one
comes down the track, the bowler pitches it short and Dhawan tucks it to the leg side for one
pitched up on off, Rayudu pushes it back and the bowler dives to his right
towards the pads, he comes down to drive it down to long-on
length ball outside off, Dhawan looked to cut it but missed
comes down and drives the length ball to long-on
Dhawan marches down too and take a single to long-on
length ball outside off, pushed down the ground for one more
shorter and flatter around off, Dhawan defends it back
another short one, this time outside leg, and Dhawan steers it to deep fine leg
slightly flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one more
on the off stump and turning away, Rayudu defends off the backfoot
comes down and drives it down to long-on

slightly quicker and straighter and it's gone through! Mendis pitched it short, Dhawan didn't react quickly and played with a cross-bat and could not get his bat even close to the ball in an attempt to turn it to the leg side and he has to go back for 94. Remember, he made 98 a few days back against New Zealand
pitched up around middle and leg, DK defends with a lean forward
carom ball but it's well outside off and DK has enough room to cut it past point and finds the gap for a four

another carom ball and another wicket! This one pitched closer to the stumps, was still short, and DK went back to pull it but managed a leading edge for an easy catch to mid-off. Looks like he didn't pick it and played for the offspinner
on length on middle, Jadeja leans forward to defend
coming in from outside off, Jadeja goes back and pushes it back
towards the leg stump now, he tucks it to the leg side for one
full and wide, Rayudu drives it to long-off
pitched up around middle, he defends it to midwicket
on the leg stump again, easy single to short fine leg
slightly full and quite wide, pushed wide of cover point with soft hands for one
comes down the track and drives it straight to cover
quicker one on middle ad it's pushed back to the bowler
outside off this time, Rayudu gets a bottom edge back to Mendis
turning in from middle, pushed down to long-on
flighted on off, turned to deep midwicket for one. Just three from the over
pitched up, RJ charges down the track and launches it over long-on for a clean six. That hit the sight screen
on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket for one
quicker one down the leg side for a wide

Rayudu tries to do a Jadeja but he doesn't get the distance. He came down the track and lofted the length ball form outside off straight to long-off for an easy catch. Kusal Perera was well inside the boundary for the catch
flat and on middle stump, Binny defends it back
short of length and outside off, guides it to backward point
angled in from wide of the crease, Binny puts a foot forward to defend
angled in towards RJ who defends it back

chance for a run out but Senanayake doesn't get the direct hit. It was slightly slower outside off, RJ defended it towards midwicket and after a slight mix-up they went for the single. RJ was way outside the crease

loud appeal for lbw and Binny is gone for a duck! This one was turning in from outside off as Binny put his front foot forward to turn it to leg, he missed and the ball struck him right in front of the stumps. Easy decision and the finger went up straightaway
turns in a bit from outside off, Ashwin defends it back
tad shorter and Ashwin tucks it to midwicket
on length outside off, pushed down off the backfoot to long-on
length ball outside off, pushed past cover for one
short of length on leg stump, tucked off the hips to leg for a single
shorter one outside off, Ashwin walked back to drive it to deep cover
length ball on the pads, steered to the leg side for one
slightly slower and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short of length outside off, keeps low and Ashwin cuts it late, but not very late, and it beats third man for four
full and swinging away sightly from off, Jadeja helps it past cover for a single
strays on the leg side, Ashwin plays off the hips to fine leg
nearly a yorker on middle and leg, RJ defends to midwicket
down the leg side for a wide
short of length outside off, RJ opens the face of the bat to help it to point
short of length around off, RJ cuts it late to third man
tries a yorker but it's a knee-length full toss and Ashwin steers it to leg for one. Just five runs from the over
on length on middle and leg, turned to the leg side for one
just down the leg side, as RJ tried to play it fine, for a wide
on length on the off stump, pushed to cover
offspinner outside off, it keeps very low and goes through the batsman and keeper's legs for byes
quicker one on off, RJ defends to cover point for a quick single
comes down the track but the ball turns away a bit and Ashwin can't connect, takes it on the pads
on the stumps this time, pushed down to long-on
low full toss on Ashwin's toes, he steers it to fine leg for one
in the block hole on off, digs it out to cover
yorker again, Jadeja defends close to the stumps for a single
outswinger outside off, Ashwin slogs and gets a thick outside edge over the slips area for four

beautifully lofted down the ground towards long-on as Malinga pitched it up, it didn't go all the way. Mahela chased but over ran and crossed the boundary line but the ball did not, and he came back to keep it back inside the boundary. Did his fingers touch the boundaryâ€¦replays aren't completely conclusive and it's not a boundary
the yorker works this time - it was the third of the over. Ashwin came down to charge, tried to help it behind square with an open face of the bat but missed and the ball hit the base of off stump
pitched up on middle, no room at all and RJ defends it back
touch wider outside off, RJ tried a big drive and it goes down to long-on

another stumping appeal by the quick Sanga! It went down the leg side for a wide as Bhuvi tried to help it to leg. He missed, his backfoot was on the crease as Sanga took the bails off and it seems like Bhuvi will have to walk back. OUT says the third umpire
pitched up on off, pushed back to the bowler
POW! What a shot from Shami - Mendis pitched it up outside off and Shami sent it 96 metres away from the pitch with a big slog to the midwicket boundary
slightly slower on off, Shami pushes it back and it was in the air for a bit
one more from Shami! He gets another full delivery and clobbers it to the same area with a big heave. Goes all the way - clean hits from the No. 11
where does it pitch? In the block hole outside off, RJ gives Shami the strike with a single
in the block hole again, Shami gets bat on it for a single
yorker again, on the leg stump, RJ doesn't have any room and gets a single on the leg side
fourth straight yorker, this one is defended back to the bowler
Shami makes room, smashes it on the off side along the ground but it goes straight to cover and they scamper for one more
in the block hole outside off, RJ helps it to third man for one more. Five singles off six yorkers in the last over

inn2.comm: that swings away just a touch, starts outside off and Kusal Perera is happy to let that go
pitched up, on off stump, pushed through cover for a single
pitched up and outside off, Thirimanne happy to allow that to the keeper
shorter, 126kph, on middle and leg, solidly defended by Thirimanne
big appeal for lbw, would that have taken leg stump? nah, was sliding down legstump, Bhuvneshwar getting the ball to come in
watchfully defended to the off side
off the pads and the ball rolls towards short fine
length ball is pushed off the front foot towards cover for a quick single
pitched up and on middle stump, worked towards midwicket for a couple
that is a brutal hit from Perera, and superbly fielded by Kohli at mid-off, that was struck sweetly on the up, but Kohli is quick enough to cut that off, no runs for a good shot
and now four runs for a streak one! off the bottom edge and wide of the keeper, runs away towards the fine-leg boundary
an ungainly attempt at a pull by Perera, he doesn't connect
moving away outside off, left alone
and another leave outside off, Bhiuvneshwar getting the ball to curve away just a bit
what a shot, crisp hit from Thirimanne for four through cover, gets forward and then shifts back before caressing it through the field for an effortless four
outside off and left alone
back of length ball on leg stump, gets behind the line and blocks to the leg side
slanting in towards the pads, Thirimanne leans across and tucks the ball towards mid-on

a collision between the fielders, thankfully not a full-on nasty one like the infamous Gillespie and Waugh, Kusal Perera miscued towards point, Dhawan was the man coming in to get under that skier, Rahane was racing back from circle, Rahane gets his hands on the ball but drops it, and he brushes against Dhawan's head when attempting the catch, and the ball dribbles away for four
short of length ball is flat-batted towards mid-on
defended off the back foot towards extra cover
solidly defended back towards the bowler
from round the wicket, left alone outside off
gets forward and defends towards midwicket
looking to drive a length ball through the off side, inside-edges it towards the leg side instead
pitched up and that is defended to the off side
looks to crash it towards point but doesn't connect with the wide delivery
a maiden from Bhuvneshwar, more defence to end the over
ugly but effective, Kusal Perera swipes that to the leg side, sends the ball towards wide long-on, Binny makes a sliding stop just before the ball reaches the rope
short of length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side

has Jadeja pulled off a stunner here? nope he hasn't, that was lashed towards cover by Perera, and Jadeja threw himself to his right to get a hand on it, but he can't grasp it, would have been a special catch if he had hung on
blocked to the leg side
short ball on leg stump, pulled behind square leg for four
overpitched and that is crunched back past the bowler, Thirimanne playing some lovely stroke here, this one the best so far
defended down the ground by Perera
Perera, as usual, looking to hammer the ball, this time through the off side, a bottom edge sends the ball towards fine leg
length ball on the pads, tapped towards the leg side
looking to slog that to the leg side, he missed, Perera looking to dispatch the ball to midwicket though it kept low outside off
crisp drive towards cover, can't pierce the field
length ball on off stump, defended towards short midwicket
he continues with new Narine-style action, starts with a full ball that is pushed back towards the bowler
Thirimannewhacks the second ball over long-off for six, a length ball spinning away but Thirimanne connects perfectly
defended to the off side
worked to midwicket for a single
pitched up and that is driven towards long-off for one more
eased down the ground for a single
left alone outside off
slanting in towards middle and leg, defended to the leg side
slapped towards point by Thirimanne this time
well outside off, looking to crash it through cover, but off the bottom of the bat to the off side
length ball on off stump, punched towards mid-off, and that is another dot ball
no maiden as Thirimanne elegantly sends the final ball past point for four, effortless
massive hit for six, a touch short from Shami, Perera goes hard at everything, this time he makes terrific contact, that goes a mile in the air, and far enough to clear the rope
length ball is pushed towards short cover
length ball is punched towards mid-on for a quick single
length ball is driven towards short cover
length ball, slower one - 122 kph - guided behind point for a single
fuller one, on middle and off, 124kph, defended back towards the bowler
short ball coming in from outside off, Thirimanne pulls but gets an edge fine on off for one
short of length outside off, turned to deep midwicket for a single
length ball driven beautifully past cover and Kohli dives to his right from mid-off to save three runs
on length outside off, defends it back to the bowler
slightly slower just outside off keeps low as Perera slogs but misses
stifled appeal for lbw as he tries to turn it to leg but is hit on the pad outside off
tossed up around off, pushed down the ground to long-off for one
turning away from outside off, he comes down and drives to cover
turns towards middle from outside leg, the batsman leans forward and blocks
outside leg and it's swept to leg for a single
sweeps again, it's in the air but clears the midwicket fielder easily and falls in no man's land for one more
pitched up outside off and turning away, Perera swats it back along the ground past the bowler and then past mid-on for a four
bowls it full and down leg, helped to deep fine leg for one
on length on the pads, tucked to deep midwicket for a single
113kph, on the pads again and he guides it to leg for one more
offcutter towards middle from leg, Kusal defends it back
wide outside off, Kusal helps it along the way to guide it past point
on the pads again, tucked straight to midwicket
comes down and makes it a full toss to drive it down to long-off
drifting in towards off, the batsman defends it back
around off again, another defence from the batsman
drives it down to long-off from length past the bowler
wider and fuller outside off, drives to deep cover for one
flighted and on length outside off, pushed to cover point but there's no time for a single
slightly full on off, Kusal guides it to point
shorter outside off, driven square on the off side for one
back of length on the stumps, Thirimanne tucks it in the air on the leg side
124kph, on length and angling away outside off, helps it to sweeper cover
length ball on the pads and it's tucked to deep square leg for a single
114kph, slightly slower on the pads, steered to the leg side for another easy single
short of length well outside off, Kusal goes to the backfoot to cut it
slightly fuller outside off, driven to sweeper cover for one more
wider outside off, Kusal cuts it late, but straight to short third man
flighted on middle, Kusal defends it back to the bowler
touch fuller on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on
flighted and fuller on leg, drives it to cover

Jadeja nearly catches another one with a terrific effort. It was pitched up on middle and leg, Kusal lofted it high on the leg side, didn't get much distance and Jadeja ran in from deep midwicket, dived forward full length, got his hands also to it but could not hold on to it when his elbows hit the ground
length ball on middle, helped to the leg side for one
on length on the pads, tucked to deep midwicket for one
slightly full on the pads, driven down to long-on
on length outside off, drives it down to mid-off for one
offcutter on middle and leg, Kusal defends it back
coming in from off on length, driven to cover point

loud appeal for lbw and the finger's gone up! It was a length delivery going towards middle stump, Thirimanne went back to turn it to leg, missed it and was trapped in front of middle and leg to be given out. Time for some drinks
full on the off stump, driven straight to cover
slightly slower on leg, Sanga defends on leg with soft hands for a single
length ball headed towards middle and off, cut late to short third man
touch fuller on off, drives it straight to cover
length delivery on leg, tucked off the pads for an easy single
short of length on the pads again, pushed towards mid-on
well outside off this time, drives it with the angle to sweeper cover
pitched up and Kusal sends it all the way! It was on the leg stump again and Kusal whipped it behind square on the leg side for a six
off cutter towards off from middle, pushed back to the bowler
fuller on middle, pushed to cover and Sanga is sent back by Kusal for the single
slightly full on off, pushed down to long-off for one
towards leg, helped to short fine leg and they steal a quick and risky single
length ball on off, drives it straight to cover
short of length on middle, Sanga goes back and tucks it to the leg side
gets some turn outside off as Kusal looks to cut but misses
leans forward to push the length delivery cover point
Jadeja fires it in full, driven towards long-on for a single
skips down the track and pushes towards long-on for a single
for the third time in a row, a single to long-on
loud appeal for lbw, but that hit him well outside off and Kusal was looking to work the ball to the leg side
spinning in towards off stump, defended towards midwicket
tossed up, another single to long-on to bring up his half-century
short of length outside off, pushed down to long-on
touch shorter on middle, pushed just past midwicket for one more
slightly full around off, Kusal takes a step down and turns it to deep midwicket for two
comes down again and drives to long-on
on length wider outside off, Sanga leans forward to defend
that's a beautiful drive from Sanga! He got one on length well outside off , leaned forward and drove it along the ground through the covers for four
turns this one to long-on for one from length
pushed back to the bowler with a step down the track
short of length ball on middle and off stump, worked towards midwicket
length ball is defended to cover
on the pads, short of length ball is whipped behind square leg for a single
on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg for a couple
short of length ball just outside off, defended  with soft hands, the keeper has to move to his left to field that
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
lovely hit from Sangakkara, lofted over the bowler's head for four, a warm welcome there for Rayudu
defended towards cover this time
guided down towards third man for a single
pushed back towards the bowler
drops it short, much too short, Kusal Perera accepts the gift, slugs it away towards midwicket for four
on the pads this time, Kusal guides it towards fine leg, Ashwin huffs and puffs in pursuit, catching up just in time
short of length ball on leg stump, looks to work it to the leg side, can't connect and is struck on the thigh pad
drops it short, whacked towards midwicket - Kusal really loves that area - doesn't bother with keeping it down, gets a couple
pitched up and that is eased towards mid-off
Sri Lanka coasting here, another boundary, and this brings up the 50 stand, this was on the pads and was an easy put away, worked behind square leg
defended towards mid-off this time
short of length ball is pushed off the front foot towards cover
length ball is chipped towards cover, lands short of the fielder
beaten outside off, Sangakkara looking to work the ball down the ground, can't connect
gets deep in the crease and eases this towards long-on for a single
Ashwin has the breakthrough, it is his hundredth one as well, zips off the surface after pitching around off, takes the outside edge and a smart take by Karthik, do India still have a chance here?
a loud appeal but no way was that going on to hit the stumps, struck outside off from round the wicket
a wide down the leg side to start
defends towards mid-on
skips down the track and eases it towards mid-on for a single
worked towards midwicket
length ball to start from Rohit, worked towards square leg
down the leg side, looking to sweep but that hits the pad
defended towards midwicket by Sanga
pretty decent over so far, pushed back towards the bowler for another dot ball
length ball on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
length ball is worked towards midwicket for one, just two off the over
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot towards point
length ball is blocked off the front foot towards cover
tapped towards cover off the front foot another dot ball, and the run-rate is over 6
pitched up, driven towards long-off for a single

is he stumped? looked like it but the third umpire being consulted, that was a delivery on the pads, Sangakkara missed it and that bounces off the pads to Karthik, who has to stretch to his right to collect it, he swings his hand towards the stumps but he misses the stumps, Sanga was out of the crease, but Karthik didn't break the stumps on the first attempt, which gives Sanga time to get back, how crucial will this be?
defended to the off side to end the over
length ball on the pads, clipped towards square leg by Mahela
Mahela is superb on this shot, gets on one knee and sweeps that firmly behind square leg, a lofted shot but perfectly safe
length ball spinning in towards off stump, clipped towards square leg
through Dhawan's legs! that should not have been a run, it was tapped towards cover by Sangakkara, Dhawan makes a hash of a simple stop, and a single
overpitched and on the pads, clipped towards midwicket, Dhawan dives as he tries to stop that one, but it is beyond his reach
looking to paddle sweep this full ball down the leg side, doesn't connect properly
soft dismissal there! Jayawardene has chipped a catch to extra cover, he picked out that fielder perfectly, Rohit didn't have to move as that catch at an easy pace at waist height

Jadeja is turning the game here, he has two in two, this time it is Chandimal who is gone, terrific ball to get first up, pitching on off and middle and zipping away to take off stump, a golden duck for Chandimal, Jadeja on a hat-trick, this game has come alive
no hat-trick, gets an outside edge down towards third man for two
length ball on off stump, solid defence off the front foot
nearly a third in the over there, getting the ball to rush off the surface, past the outside edge as Mathews tries to defend
defended back towards Jadeja, no more a cakewalk that it had appeared for Sri Lanka
eased towards wide long-on for a single
length ball is whipped towards wide long-on for a single
pitched up and that is again worked towards wide long-on, Sanga gets one more
length ball just outside off, tapped towards long-on for a single
looks to drive this wide delivery, beaten
pushed back towards Rohit, another quiet over from him, the asking rate keeps creeping up
full ball is driven towards extra cover
pushed towards cover
tapped towards extra cover, another dot ball
length ball, Angelo skips down the track and defends
quicker one, defended off the back foot, and that's five dots in the over
it's a maiden, and what a time to bowl it, that too just after bowling a double-wicket over, Jadeja doing a superb job here
overpitched, driven towards long-off for a single
defended off the front foot by Mathews
on the pads, worked towards square leg
a bit of width, Sangakkara capitalises, waits for it to arrive and chops it behind point
blocked off the front foot
gets deep in the crease and pushes the ball towards cover
Sanga comes down to steer the ball on leg to the on side but manages a leg bye
defends the length ball on off for a quick single
well down leg, but Sanga sweeps it straight to short fine leg
outside leg again, helped to deep square leg for one
turns away from length outside off, thick edge goes to short third man
slightly flatter around off, defends to the off side behind square
Sanga comes down a step and lofts the ball on leg towards long-on

Shami strikes now! There was a loud appeal for lbw as the ball seamed in sharply after pitching outside off and trapped Mathews in front of the stumps. It was a back of length ball and hit him high on the pads but the umpire didn't take long to raise the finger
aimed at the stumps again, steered to deep fine leg for one
back of length on leg, pushed down to long-on easily
chipped in the air straight down the ground as it was pitched up. He didn't use too much power but made sure it landed right between mid-on and mid-off and it had enough to go for a four
short ball on off, pulled to deep square leg for one, eight from the over
beats the outside edge with turn outside the off stump, very close to the bat and the bat
touch shorter and he helps it to point
tight around off and pushed to cover
on the off stump again, pushed down to mid-off
keeps low after pitching on middle, Senanayake managed to get bat on it
he avoids the maiden with a single down the ground to mid-off
what a beauty from Shami at 142kph! It was a sharp leg cutter which pitched on off and it just straightened to miss the off stump and beat the outside edge by a whisker
slightly shorter and outside off, Senanayake helps it along the way using the pace of the ball and guides it beautifully between point and short third man for four
angled towards middle and leg, steered to deep midwicket for one
this time from Sanga - four more! Shami pitched it on leg and Sanga cashed in by driving it past midwicket to beat long-on too for four
on leg again, drives it down easily to long-on

Shami strikes again! Senayanake takes the aerial route even though the five balls had gone for 10 runs so far. Shami pitched it up towards middle and leg and the batsman chipped it straight to Rohit Sharma at midwicket
on middle and leg, turned to the leg side for one
loud appeal for lbw from Jadeja as the batsman was struck on the front pad as he leaned forward to defend but he got a leg bye
sweet timing and use of the feet from Sanga! He came down the track and lofted the ball towards the midwicket area for four by finding the gap
another loud appeal from Jadeja and DK as the ball goes down the leg side but there was some sound. Maybe the umpire thinks it took the pad
on leg again, steered to midwicket
uses his feet again as the ball pitches outside leg and he lofts it towards deep midwicket for two easy runs
outside the off stump, the batsman defends it back
short of length outside off, drives to sweeper cover for one
uses his feet and pushes the short of length ball down towards mid-off
back of length again outside off, steered to long-on for a single
Sanga attacks the other side this time, drives the length ball inside out over cover with a lot of power for two runs, couldn't middle it
gets the hang of it this time - right from the meat of the bat. He goes inside out again and finds the gap between sweeper cover and long-off for a one-bounce four. Nine from the over
short ball well outside off and de Silva pounced on it with a powerful cut off the backfoot for four more
full toss just outside off, pushed down to long-off
flighted on off, driven just wide of cover where the fielder dives but can't hold on to it
on length on middle, drives it down to long-on
flighted and slower outside off, Sanga helps it with the turn to deep cover
flighted just outside off, the batsman drives it down and cover cuts it in time
short of length and SAnga has enough time to loft it to the wide long-on boundary for four
inside edge onto the pads, they take a quick single and Karthik nearly concedes overthrows
short of length on leg, de Silva looks to turn it to leg but misses and gets hit on the body
touch fuller outside off, driven to cover
full toss outside off, pushed down to long-on for one
full on the stumps and Sanga drives it down beautifully past the bowler for two by the time long-on cuts it off
strikes on the first ball! He pitched it short of length on middle, de Silva came down to steer it to leg but missed and it hit him right in front of the stumps, didn't bounce too much
on length on middle and leg, defends it towards midwicket
short of length and flatter on off, Perera defends by leaning forward
on middle this time and Perera steers it to midwicket
leg-stump line and Perera defends on the leg side
Perera avoids the maiden by pushing it down to long-on for one
outside off on length, guides it to point
touch shorter outside off, Perera cuts it late behind square on off
length ball outside off, drives it straight to cover
comes down the track and Sanga drives the ball from leg to midwicket for one
short of length on middle, tucked on the leg side for one
comes down again and drives he length ball with power to long-off
and he delivers a full toss which Sanga guides beautifully between short third man and point for four
full on the stumps, Sanga drives it down to long-off for one
full toss around off, drives it to long-on for one
full on off, drives it on the up to wide long-on for two more

third full toss of the over, Sanga drives it to deep cover where Binny runs and dives to his left to save two runs for sure. He had to attempt twice to keep the ball in, the send one was when he was very close to the boundary rope
in the block hole finally and Sanga pushes it down for one
what a blow! Sanga gets his front foot out of the way and launches the slower ball deep in the stands for a big six to the midwicket boundary
in the block hole and Sanga drives it down to long-off
full on middle and Perera hits Sanga with a straight drive but they get a single
attempted yorker is a full toss and it goes to long-on after a bounce
in the block hole on leg stump, Perera digs it out to cover
in the block hole again and Perera take a single with a drive to long-on
no room on offer with a block hole just outside off, Perera takes a single with a drive down to long-on
low full toss, nearly a yorker, Sanga pushes it to cover
it's a full toss this time, a low one outside off, and Sanga finds the gap past point to find the boundary as there's nobody in the deep there
better delivery this time, in the block hole just outside off, and Sanga gets a thick bottom edge which sends the ball fine on off for four more
full on off, driven down easily to long-off for one
another one in the block hole and Perera charges it down to long-on for a single
full on leg, Perera clears his front foot and drives it to long-on

that's his hundred! Low full toss on leg, Sanga whips it to the deep square leg boundary where Dhawan did well to stop it but could not collect it and the ball rolled to the boundary for Sanga's 18th hundred

and Sanga is gone, or is he? It was a waist-high full toss on off, Sanga went for it and thick edge goes straight to Ashwin at short third man where he takes a low catch. The umpires are checking: the foot has landed in the crease, the full toss is waist-high so seems fine and Ashwin got his fingers under the ball to catch it. After a lot of communication with the third umpire, the finger has gone up
length ball on the off stump, thick outside edge goes to third man for one
low full toss on off, driven down firmly for one
edged and four! It wasn't a poor delivery from Shami, Mendis drove with power and got an outside edge just outside the keeper's reach on the of side for four
dropped! Would you believe it - Perera drove it straight to Dhawan at mid-off, it was at a comfortable height but the ball simply popped out of his hands
it's all over for India - Perera manages a bottom edge towards mid-on and calls for the single and might have been close if it was a direct hit and the overthrow also goes to the boundary
